terms.definition: A lawyer who provides free legal advice and representation in court for individuals who do not have their own lawyer.

Family Summary Legal Advice (SLA) lawyers explain legal rights, obligations, and court procedures based on your family legal case. Their scope includes reviewing individuals' family court matter and referring them to the certificate program.

Criminal Summary Legal Advice lawyers (SLA) offer legal advice by explaining legal rights, responsibilities, and court processes. â€‹This includes guidance on court appearances, such as charge resolutions, including pleas, sentencing, and diversion options. Including assessing an individual's risk to liberty and referring them to the certificate program.
